name: BBTAG DLC Character Pack Vol.7 - Heart/NaotoKurogane/Teddie/Seth
detailed_description:
The time to intersect is nigh!

Download Cross Tag Character Pack 7 to add four new fighters to your roster! Character Pack 7 contains Heart Aino from Arcana Heart, Naoto Kurogane from BlazBlue, Teddie from Persona 4 Arena, and Seth from Under Night In-Birth.
about_the_game:

Download Cross Tag Character Pack 7 to add four new fighters to your roster! Character Pack 7 contains Heart Aino from Arcana Heart, Naoto Kurogane from BlazBlue, Teddie from Persona 4 Arena, and Seth from Under Night In-Birth.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 8.1 / 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 / i7
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 650 / Radeon R7 250 or better
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
